item.description:
This will be more than our usual potluck fiesta! This month, Steve invites us to his home on the border between Hartford and West Hartford to share Latin food. Karen, the organizer of this special meet-up says: "Bring a recipe (with copies to share) or a prepared dish, or just come to see--and eat--what others bring." Steve will supply the wine, and also invites people to prepare their dish at his house. He has most of the necessary spices--just bring the main ingredients.

Steve's house is on Prospect Ave between Asylum Aveenue and Albany Avenue (Rt. 44). Any questions, call him at 860-306-4300.

group.name: The Hartford Spanish Language Meetup Group

item.name: The Hartford Spanish Language January Food Fiesta
